description: A committee will consider whether current firework laws, passed in 2004, need to be renewed.
title: Isle of Man firework laws to be reviewed amid animal welfare concerns
title_page: Isle of Man firework laws to be reviewed amid animal welfare concerns - BBC News
maintext: "I don't think it's being truculent or anything else to try and get a committee just to have a look at it to see what is viable, what will work for everybody," she added.
